ygData.subject: Re: other goodies? **possible spoiler**
ygData.msgSnippet: You speak of Tovax... He is a evil little b......  I plan on getting a party together soon and taking him out... (cazic-thul server)  If you or any one wants
ygData.messageBody:
You speak of Tovax... He is a evil little b...... I plan on getting a party
together soon and taking him out... (cazic-thul server) If you or any one
wants to be part of this, I plan, as of now, to do him in on Monday of next
week at about 9:30pm est.

Rutreeii

p.s. I would be happy to do it sooner if I can get a party together sooner
that will be willing to beat his sorry (bony) ass....(er skeleton *chuckle*)

----- Original Message -----
From: Spehar, David J <David.Spehar@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 06, 1999 10:02 AM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] other goodies? **possible spoiler**


> From: "Spehar, David J" <David.Spehar@...>
>
> I think I ran into this Necro in Queynos Hills at one time. I was 15th
> level and it conned blue to me. I couldnt figure out why it regarded me
> indifferently then attack me with disease clouds. I did nothing agressive
> to it...just walked by it. Anyway, i never killed it but saw it at the
zone
> entrance from karana.
>
> Ill look again for him...this time I will have no mercy for him!
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Lim Dul [mailto:sevendegrees@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, May 05, 1999 5:18 PM
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eq_wizards] other goodies? **possible spoiler**
>
>
> From: "Lim Dul" <sevendegrees@...>
>
> I've seen some high-leveled Wizards carry this item in their
secondary....it
>
> looks like a little voodoo doll. Upon closer inspection, it's something
> like a bronze idol?
>
> Anybody have an idea about what it does and where to get it?
>
> I've also heard about a rare black globe (?) that you can get from a NPC
> gnome necro in Queynos Hills? Gives 9INT. Stat and availability?
>
> --Lim'Dul
>
